Name: PaperPlane
About the game: This is a game that simulates the fall of a paper plane. Avoid obstacles by controlling the direction of falling, and get high marks. Game features: 1. Press 'Left' or 'Right' to control the attitude of the paper airplane. 2. The speed of falling will change with the attitude. 3. The higher the score, the faster the speed and the greater the difficulty.
